pages.text: The $(l:blocks/coalstone_condenser)Coalstone Condenser$(/l) is a powerful advanced tool in processing materials that allows for the creation of some typically rare items, even including Diamonds.$(br2)The Condenser requires a $(l:blocks/coalstone_furnace)Coalstone Furnace$(/l) to create, and cannot be made until you have some $(item)Iron Ingots$() and $(item)Lava$() in your possession.
